DOC.brief_summary: To investigate switch fix combination treatment ( ICS LABA ) treatment influence asthma COPD treatment failure
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Study Following Reimbursement Changes Use Fixed Combination Inhalers Patients With Asthma Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: All patient treatment fix combination asthma COPD therapy January 1 2010
